com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board

Class GridTextBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board.AbstractBoard
      • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board.GridTextBoard

  • public class GridTextBoard
extends AbstractBoard
    A implementation of AbstractBoard that is entirely functional, but exposes as much data as possible for debugging purposes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int[][] BOARD_SIZE_GRID
      Defines grid sizes based on AbstractBoard.BOARD_SIZE_SMALL variables.

      • generateLayout

        protected java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> generateLayout()
        Specified by:
        generateLayout in class AbstractBoard
        Returns:
        A 1D list of TerritoryBorders that can be translated into a grid with row major order.

      • generateGridConnections

        protected java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> generateGridConnections()
        Helper method to ensure correct connections with naive (row-major grid) Territory generation.
        Specified by:
        generateGridConnections in class AbstractBoard
        Returns:
        The passed list with each TerritoryBorder now having references to the TerritoryBorders to the left, top, right, and bottom of itself if applicable.

      • assignTerritories

        protected void assignTerritories()
        Description copied from class: AbstractBoard
        Assigns Territories to Players by linking the internal Territory to a Color and registering the Territory with the Player (for caching). Each player is giving exactly the same amount of Territories (when possible). Leftovers after distributing evenly are given to random players, unless colorless territories is enabled in the AbstractBoard.config.
        Specified by:
        assignTerritories in class AbstractBoard

      • assignDice

        protected void assignDice()
        Description copied from class: AbstractBoard
        Randomly assigns a preset number of dice based on AbstractBoard.DICE_PER_PLAYER. Each owned territory is guaranteed to have at least 1 die.
        Specified by:
        assignDice in class AbstractBoard

      • coordinatesToIndex

        public int coordinatesToIndex(int row,
                              int col,
                              int cols)
        Helper method to do the 2D to 1D conversion of a row major grid to a list.
        Parameters:
        row - the grid row
        col - the grid column
        cols - the number of columns in the grid
        Returns:
        the index of a 1d list representation of the element at the row and column specified.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Returns:
        The number of rows of Territories this board has.

      • getCols

        public int getCols()
        Returns:
        The number of columns of Territories this board has.
